          <title>
            <string language="es">Test para reconocer las gráficas de Variables directa o invesamente proporcionales</string>
            <string language="en">Test: recognition of graphs of directly and inversely proportional variables</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Test: Anerkennung der Diagramme von direkt

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essai : identification des graphiques de
